Direct Known Subclasses:
ActivationProducer, CategoryProducer, ClassProducer, EffectiveAlarmProducer, EffectiveNotificationProducer, EffectiveRegistrationProducer, InstanceProducer, LocationProducer, MonologProducer, OverrideProducer
public class JAWSProducer<K,V> extends org.apache.kafka.clients.producer.KafkaProducer<K,V>
A JAWSProducer extends KafkaProducer and provides default property values for BOOTSTRAP_SERVERS and SCHEMA_REGISTRY via the environment. Type parameters:

  • Method Details

    • getHostname

      public static String getHostname()
      Attempt to determine the hostname. First COMPUTERNAME environment variable is checked, next HOSTNAME environment variable, and finally a InetAddress.getLocalHost().getHostName() DNS lookup is performed.
      Returns:
      The hostname, or null if unable to determine

    • getDefaultHeaders

      public Iterable<org.apache.kafka.common.header.Header> getDefaultHeaders()
      Attempt to build default JAWS Headers, which contain user, producer, and host names. The user name is pulled from System.getProperty("user.name"). The producer name is pulled from the config ProducerConfig.CLIENT_ID_CONFIG. The host name comes from JAWSProducer.getHostname().
      Returns:
      The default headers
